abstract: MTV hopes the four-part live concert series, called The Music Experiment, will help cement it in the minds of 18- to 25-year-olds as a music brand. For Intel, partnering with MTV is a way to get its new Ultrabook laptop in front of a fresh, young market.
snippet: MTV hopes the four-part live concert series, called The Music Experiment, will help cement it in the minds of 18- to 25-year-olds as a music brand. For Intel, partnering with MTV is a way to get its new Ultrabook laptop in front of a fresh, young ...
lead_paragraph: Advertisers typically make every effort to overcome the fickle attention spans of the millennial generation, and a new partnership between MTV and Intel is no different.

headline.main: MTV and Intel Present New Concert Series
